attributes.action: Put traffic lights on cross hands roundabout?
attributes.additional_details: With 2 deaths and over 20 incidents at the roundabout it should be time to do something about it to help.
attributes.background:
There has been many accident on the roundabout at cross hands.
With it being a few exit and 2 exit and entrance slips roads which are dual carriageways. Light on the roundabout would slow vehichles down.
